options.name: 1) Wave your body 5 times in place, then make a happy expression.
2) Do push-ups for 10 seconds and let me know after you finish.
3) Can you introduce 3 actions you can do? During the introduction of each action, perform the action you are describing.
4) Take 5 forward steps. While taking each step, say its corresponding number aloud (e.g., say '1' while stepping the first time, '2' while stepping the second time).
5) Now you can sit down first, then stand up, then say you are CoCo, then rotate 90 degrees to the left, then shrugged to the right, and make a happy expression at the same time.
7) While walking along a square with a side length of 20 cm, Keep counting. Stop counting when you finish walking.
